main event: A 10-year-old girl named Sharon Stull reported seeing a UFO and experienced painful facial burns as a result.
interesting points: Sharon Stull observed a strange egg-shaped object in the sky while at school,After watching the object for about 5-10 minutes, she developed burns on her face and eyes,The burns were diagnosed as first-degree burns, which her doctor stated could not have been caused by normal sun exposure,Questions arose regarding the Stull family's credibility and their interest in profiting from the incident,The case ultimately was deemed a hoax by investigators.
witness description: Sharon Stull and other children on the school playground
